title: Verify portfolio renders correctly across multiple screen sizes
description: Ensure that the portfolio layout and all sections (Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Contact) render properly and are visually distinct on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with no layout breaking or content overlap.

steps.description: Open portfolio landing page on desktop resolution
Verify all sections are visible, distinct, and layout is correct without overflow or overlapping
Resize viewport to tablet screen size
Verify layout adjusts responsively with no horizontal scrolling or missing content
Resize viewport to mobile screen size
Confirm all sections stack appropriately and text remains readable with no clipping

title: Validate JetBrains Mono font loads correctly and applies consistently
description: Check that the custom JetBrains Mono font is loaded without errors and is applied consistently across all text elements in the portfolio on supported browsers.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolio landing page
Use browser developer tools to verify the CSS variable --font-montreal-mono is applied
Confirm font-family of rendered text elements includes JetBrains Mono
Check network tab for successful font file loading with no errors

title: Test GSAP ScrollTrigger animations on section titles and contents
description: Verify that GSAP scroll-based animations trigger smoothly as the user scrolls through each portfolio section and content reveals as intended without performance issues or glitches.

steps.description: Open portfolio page and scroll slowly from top to bottom
Confirm animation triggers visibly on each section's title and content when entering viewport
Verify animations are smooth without jank or freezing on multiple browsers
Scroll quickly up and down multiple times
Confirm animations refresh or trigger correctly without errors

title: Validate SEO metadata in root layout is correctly set and present
description: Check the portfolio root layout for presence of correct metadata tags for SEO including title, description, and other relevant metadata and verify through SEO tools.

steps.description: Inspect page source or developer tools for metadata tags
Confirm presence of SEO meta tags such as <title>, <meta name='description'>, and Open Graph tags
Run an automated SEO analysis tool on the portfolio URL
Check report shows correct metadata and no critical SEO issues

title: Verify scroll animations unregister and refresh on component unmount
description: Ensure that the GSAP ScrollTrigger animations registered via useSectionReveal hook cleanup correctly by unregistering and refreshing on component unmount to prevent memory leaks or errors.

steps.description: Render a portfolio section that uses the useSectionReveal hook
Navigate away or unmount the section
Confirm that useSectionReveal calls GSAP ScrollTrigger refresh and unregisters listeners during cleanup
Verify no console errors or warnings occur related to GSAP during or after unmount

title: Check build and deployment process completes successfully without errors
description: Run the npm build and deployment process validating that type checks, linting, and bundling run without errors or warnings and the output artifacts (including server manifest and trace files) are generated correctly.

steps.description: Execute npm install to install dependencies
Verify no deprecated dependency warnings or errors appear
Run npm build command to build the Next.js portfolio app
Confirm type checks and linting complete successfully
Check build completes without errors or warnings
Validate that build artifacts .next/server/server-reference-manifest.js, .json and .next/trace are created

title: Verify presence and correctness of server reference manifest and metadata
description: Ensure that the server-reference-manifest files include the expected metadata such as encryption keys and correct references required for secure server rendering.

steps.description: Open the .next/server/server-reference-manifest.json file
Confirm presence of encryption key metadata in the manifest
Verify references and keys match expected formats and no missing data

title: Validate that Next.js build trace file captures timing events
description: Inspect the .next/trace file to verify it logs client, server, and edge build pipeline timing events correctly for performance and debugging purposes.

steps.description: Open the .next/trace file after a successful build
Check the file contains timing records for client, server, and edge build pipelines
Ensure timestamps and event logs are consistent and valid JSON

title: Test error handling by simulating GSAP ScrollTrigger load failure
description: Simulate a scenario where GSAP ScrollTrigger fails to register due to script loading errors and verify the app handles this gracefully without crashing or freezing and logs meaningful errors.

steps.description: Mock failure or block loading of GSAP ScrollTrigger library
Load the portfolio page and scroll through sections triggering useSectionReveal
Confirm the app does not crash or freeze
Check for error logs indicating ScrollTrigger failed to register

title: Verify accessibility and keyboard navigation of portfolio sections
description: Ensure that all portfolio sections can be accessed and navigated via keyboard controls and screen readers to comply with accessibility standards.

steps.description: Open portfolio landing page with keyboard only (no mouse)
Use tab key to navigate through Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Contact sections
Verify focus rings are visible on interactive elements if any, and sections receive focus logically
Use screen reader to check that each section's title and content is properly announced
